name: DripCube
0:
”Alexa, ask dripcube to water the herb garden for fourteen minutes”
”Alexa, ask dripcube to turn off watering to all zones”
”Alexa, open dripcube”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dripcube
des: This is a companion skill to use with your DripCube Smart Irrigation Controller. Using this skill you can access some of the most frequently used features of your sprinkler controller. You can easily turn on or off scheduled irrigation to any of the irrigation zones in your garden. You can also manually water the zones for any duration.
